verse1.verse: Follow me and I will make you fishers of men.

verse2.verse: Truly, Truly I say to you, whoever believes has eternal life.

verse3.verse: The Lord is with me. I will not be afraid.

verse4.verse: Behold, I am making all things new.

verse5.verse: If God is for us, who can be against us?

verse6.verse: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.

verse7.verse: Do unto others as you would have them do unto you?

verse8.verse: As for me and my house, we will serve the Lord.
